title: Tech Innovation Workshop 2026
description: Join us for an interactive workshop focused on modern web development, AI tools, and startup innovation. Industry mentors will guide participants through real-world case studies and hands-on coding sessions. Open to all skill levels.

title: Spring Music Festival
description: Celebrate the arrival of spring with live performances from student bands, solo artists, and guest performers. Food stands and activity booths will be available throughout the event.

title: Charity Run for Education
description: Participate in our annual 5K charity run to support educational programs for underprivileged students. Registration includes a free t-shirt and refreshments.

title: Art & Photography Exhibition
description: Experience creativity at its finest during our annual student art exhibition. Featuring paintings, digital artwork, and photography projects from talented artists across campus.

title: Career Networking Night
description: Meet professionals from various industries, build connections, and explore internship and job opportunities. Bring your CV and dress professionally.
